benefits.name: Ability Score Increase
effects: Increase your Strength or Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

benefits.name: Climb Speed
effects: You gain a Climb Speed equal to your Speed.

benefits.name: Hop Up
effects: When you have the Prone condition, you can right yourself with only 5 feet of movement.

benefits.name: Jumping
effects: You can make a running Long or High Jump after moving only 5 feet.
